mapper.select: SELECT VIE.valor AS VALOR, VIE.indicador_id AS INDICADOR_ID, VIE.variable_id AS VARIABLE_ID, VIE.codigo AS CODIGO, 'variable'||VIC.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AS VARIABLE_DESC, 'variable'||VIC.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID||'.codigo'||VIC.CODIGO AS ESTADO_DESC FROM MD_VALOR_INDICADOR_ESTADOS VIE, MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC, MD_VARS_INF VI WHERE VIC.codigo = VIE.codigo AND VIC.variable_influencia_id = VIE.variable_id AND VI.variable_influencia_id = VIE.variable_id AND VIE.indicador_id = #{indicadorId} ORDER BY VARIABLE_ID, to_number(CODIGO) ASC

SELECT VARIABLE_ID AS VARIABLE_ID, INDICADOR_ID AS INDICADOR_ID, CODIGO AS CODIGO, VALOR AS VALOR, null AS VARIABLE_DESC, null AS ESTADO_DESC FROM MD_VALOR_INDICADOR_ESTADOS WHERE VARIABLE_ID is NULL AND INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} ORDER BY VARIABLE_ID, to_number(CODIGO) ASC
SELECT VARIABLE_ID AS VARIABLE_ID, INDICADOR_ID AS INDICADOR_ID, CODIGO AS CODIGO, VALOR AS VALOR FROM MD_VALOR_INDICADOR_ESTADOS ORDER BY VARIABLE_ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MD_VALOR_INDICADOR_ESTADOS
